metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for Somali American working mother character
metadata.cultural_note: All scenes show Islamic practices and Somali culture respectfully and naturally. Hijab worn in all public/restaurant scenes.

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Darkness
scenes.lighting: dark, alarm clock glow and bedside lamp
scenes.description: A 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin and dark hair in a loose bun sits up in bed, wearing a white cotton nightgown. The burgundy comforter falls to her waist. She rubs her eyes with one hand. An orange tabby cat is curled at the foot of the bed. A digital alarm clock glows on the nightstand beside reading glasses, a glass of water, and a small green Quran. A folded prayer rug sits on the floor beside the bed. The dresser shows neatly folded colorful hijabs. The window shows total darkness -- a Minneapolis winter morning.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in loose bun, sitting up in queen bed, wearing white cotton nightgown, burgundy comforter at waist, rubbing eyes, sleepy expression, orange tabby cat curled at foot of bed, nightstand with glowing alarm clock and green book, folded prayer rug on floor, dresser with colorful folded fabric, dark window showing winter night, warm bedroom, bedside lamp glow
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, young woman, thin, pale skin, bright daylight, inappropriate

scenes.title: Unfolding the Prayer Rug
scenes.description: Aisha kneels on the carpet beside the bed, unfolding a rectangular prayer rug with a deep green background and gold geometric patterns. She smooths it flat with both hands. The bedside lamp lights the scene. The orange tabby cat watches from the bed, amber eyes glowing. The alarm clock reads 5:43. The room is quiet and still. The burgundy comforter is visible on the made bed. The dresser with colorful hijabs is in the background.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in bun, wearing white nightgown, kneeling on floor beside queen bed, unfolding rectangular prayer rug with green and gold geometric pattern, smoothing it flat, orange tabby cat watching from bed, bedside lamp warm light, alarm clock on nightstand, peaceful early morning, quiet bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, bright light, daylight, standing, inappropriate

scenes.title: Prostration in Prayer
scenes.description: Aisha is in sujud (prostration), forehead and nose touching the green and gold prayer rug, palms flat beside her head, knees on the rug. A white prayer garment covers her head and body. The green and gold geometric pattern is visible around her hands. The bedside lamp illuminates the scene softly. The clock reads 5:47. The orange tabby cat has lifted his head on the bed to watch. The room is deeply still and reverent.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman in prostration on prayer rug, forehead touching green and gold geometric rug, white prayer garment covering head and body, palms flat on rug, kneeling, bedside lamp warm light, orange tabby cat watching from bed, peaceful reverent prayer scene, early morning, quiet bedroom, respectful depiction of Islamic prayer

scenes.title: Choosing a Hijab
scenes.description: Aisha stands at the dresser with the overhead bedroom light on. She surveys her hijab collection: neatly folded squares of fabric in purple, teal, burgundy, cream, and patterned prints stacked on the dresser. A few hijabs hang from small hooks on the wall. She picks up a teal hijab and holds it against herself, considering. Her dark hair is in a bun. Family photos in frames sit among the hijabs. The orange tabby cat rubs against her ankles. The made bed with burgundy comforter is visible behind her.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in neat bun, wearing blue floral house dress, standing at dresser examining colorful hijab collection (purple teal burgundy cream), holding teal hijab against herself, family photos on dresser, small hooks with hanging hijabs, orange tabby cat at ankles, made bed with burgundy comforter behind, warm bedroom, morning light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, wearing hijab, young woman, dark room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Making the Bed
scenes.lighting: gray dawn light and bedside lamp
scenes.description: Aisha pulls up the burgundy comforter, smoothing it over the queen bed with both hands. She straightens decorative pillows -- two cream and one with a gold geometric pattern -- arranging them against the headboard. The orange tabby cat sits on the floor watching. The dresser with hijab collection is visible. The window shows gray Minneapolis winter dawn with bare tree branches. The prayer rug is folded in its place beside the bed. The room is taking shape for the day.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in bun, wearing house dress, making queen bed, smoothing burgundy comforter, arranging cream and gold decorative pillows against headboard, orange tabby cat sitting on floor watching, dresser with colorful hijabs visible, window showing gray winter dawn and bare trees, folded prayer rug beside bed, warm bedroom morning scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, messy room, dark, summer, inappropriate

scenes.title: Performing Wudu -- Washing Hands
scenes.description: Aisha stands at the bathroom sink performing wudu (ritual ablution). She holds both hands under running water from the faucet, washing them carefully. Her nightgown sleeves are pushed up above her wrists. The water flows over her medium brown hands into the white porcelain sink. A soap dispenser sits nearby. The mirror reflects her focused expression -- dark hair in a bun, no hijab. A small cup of water sits on the counter. Towels hang on the rack. The bright overhead light fills the clean bathroom.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in bun, white nightgown with sleeves pushed up, standing at bathroom sink washing hands under running faucet, performing wudu ablution, focused peaceful expression, mirror reflection, soap dispenser, small cup on counter, white porcelain sink, bright overhead light, clean simple bathroom, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, dark bathroom, dirty, luxury bathroom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Performing Wudu -- Washing Face
scenes.description: Aisha cups water in both hands and washes her face, splashing gently from forehead to chin. Water droplets glisten on her medium brown skin. Her eyes are closed as water runs over her round face. A small towel is draped over her shoulder for drying. The faucet runs steadily. The mirror shows the back of her head -- dark hair in a bun. The bright bathroom light reflects off the water droplets. The soap dispenser and toiletries sit on the counter.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, dark hair in bun, cupping water in hands and splashing face at bathroom sink, eyes closed, water droplets on round face, small towel on shoulder, faucet running, bright overhead light, mirror behind, soap and toiletries on counter, peaceful wudu ablution ritual, clean bathroom, morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, open eyes, dark bathroom, inappropriate, suggestive

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Aisha stands at the bathroom sink brushing her teeth with a blue toothbrush. White toothpaste foam is at the corners of her mouth. She wears the blue floral house dress. Her dark hair is in a bun. The bathroom counter holds a toothbrush holder with four toothbrushes of different colors for the family, a tube of toothpaste, the soap dispenser, and her comb. She brushes in steady circular motions. The bright overhead light is reflected in the mirror. Towels hang on the rack.

scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, dark bathroom, inappropriate, child toothbrush

scenes.title: Washing Face -- Face Cream
scenes.description: Aisha applies face cream from a small jar, rubbing it into her medium brown skin in gentle circles -- forehead, cheeks, nose, chin. In the mirror, her round face looks refreshed and awake. Her warm brown eyes are bright. She pats her face dry with a small towel. The soap dispenser, comb, and hair ties sit on the counter. Water droplets dot the mirror from previous washing. The bright bathroom light illuminates every detail.

scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, hijab, dark bathroom, inappropriate, heavy makeup

scenes.title: Performing Wudu -- Washing Feet
scenes.description: Aisha sits on the edge of the bathtub, washing her right foot with water from a cup. She holds her foot over the tub, pouring water and rubbing between the toes. The plain beige shower curtain hangs behind her. Her nightgown is lifted slightly to keep dry. The small bath rug is pushed aside. Brown house slippers wait on the tile floor. Her expression is serene and unhurried despite the early hour. The bathroom light is bright.

scenes.title: Chopping Onions
scenes.description: Aisha stands at a stainless steel prep table in the commercial kitchen, chopping onions with a sharp chef's knife on a large cutting board. She dices the onion into small even pieces. Her brown hands move with practiced speed. Tears form in her eyes from the onion fumes. She wears a teal hijab, cream tunic, dark pants, and a white apron. A growing pile of diced onion covers one side of the cutting board. A container waits to receive the chopped onions. The fluorescent light reflects off the stainless steel. Onion skins collect near the edge.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, wearing teal hijab, cream tunic, white apron, chopping onions with chef's knife at stainless steel prep table, large cutting board, pile of diced white onion, tears in warm brown eyes from onions, practiced fast hands, commercial kitchen, bright fluorescent light, onion skins on table edge, food preparation
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, no hijab, home kitchen, dark, inappropriate, young woman

scenes.title: Frying Sambusas
scenes.description: Aisha carefully lowers sambusas into hot oil in a commercial deep fryer using a slotted spoon. Four golden triangle pastries bob in the bubbling oil, turning deep golden brown. She watches them carefully, turning each one with the spoon. The oil crackles and bubbles. She wears a teal hijab, cream tunic, and white apron. A tray lined with paper towels sits beside the fryer, ready for the finished sambusas. The kitchen smells of fried pastry and seasoned beef. The stainless steel fryer gleams under the fluorescent light.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, wearing teal hijab, cream tunic, white apron, carefully lowering golden triangle sambusas into commercial deep fryer with slotted spoon, bubbling hot oil, four sambusas frying golden brown, tray with paper towels nearby, commercial kitchen, bright fluorescent light, steam and cooking energy, focused expression
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, no hijab, home kitchen, dark, inappropriate, young woman, burns

scenes.title: Cooking Suqaar
scenes.description: Aisha cooks suqaar (Somali stir-fried chicken) on the commercial gas stove. Marinated chicken pieces sizzle in a large frying pan, turning golden with turmeric. She spreads the pieces with a metal spatula. The spice aroma -- cumin, coriander, turmeric -- fills the air. She wears a teal hijab, cream tunic, and white apron with a small yellow turmeric stain. The exhaust hood hums above the stove. The spice rack on the wall behind shows colorful jars. The blue gas flame is visible under the pan. Fatima preps vegetables at the table behind her.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, wearing teal hijab, cream tunic, white apron with turmeric stain, cooking stir-fried chicken in large pan on commercial gas stove, golden turmeric-colored chicken sizzling, metal spatula in hand, blue gas flame visible, exhaust hood above, spice rack with colorful jars behind, commercial kitchen, bright fluorescent light, cooking steam and aroma
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, no hijab, home kitchen, dark, inappropriate, young woman

scenes.title: Folding Sambusas
scenes.camera_view: at prep table, close-up on hands
scenes.description: Aisha and a younger woman (Fatima, in purple hijab) stand side by side at the prep table, folding sambusas. A tray of thin triangular pastry wrappers lies between them, along with a bowl of seasoned ground beef filling. Aisha takes a wrapper, spoons filling onto one corner, and folds it into a tight triangle, pressing the edges to seal. Her hands move quickly and expertly. A tray of finished sambusas grows beside them -- neat golden triangles in rows. A small bowl of water helps seal the edges. Both women wear aprons over their tunics.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, two Somali American women at stainless steel prep table folding sambusas, older woman (40, teal hijab, cream tunic, white apron) and younger woman (mid-twenties, purple hijab, dark top, white apron), folding thin pastry wrappers into triangles with beef filling, quick expert hands, tray of finished golden triangle sambusas in rows, bowl of filling, commercial kitchen, bright fluorescent light, teamwork cooking scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, no hijabs, home kitchen, dark, inappropriate, men only

scenes.title: Checking the Rice
scenes.description: A kitchen timer beeps. Aisha lifts the lid from a large commercial pot on the stove, and a cloud of fragrant steam rises -- cinnamon and cardamom. She uses a fork to fluff the basmati rice gently, checking that the grains are fluffy and separate. The rice is perfect -- long white grains with a golden tint from the spices. A cinnamon stick is visible among the grains. She wears the teal hijab, cream tunic, and white apron. The spice rack is behind her. The exhaust hood captures the steam. She holds the pot lid in one hand and the fork in the other.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 40-year-old Somali American woman with medium brown skin, wearing teal hijab, cream tunic, white apron, lifting lid from large pot on commercial stove, cloud of fragrant steam rising, fluffing fluffy white basmati rice with fork, cinnamon stick visible in rice, spice rack behind, exhaust hood above, bright fluorescent light, checking food, commercial kitchen, cooking
